original_text: You fat sheep use your shoulders to push the other sheep away. You attack the weak sheep with your horns so that they run away.
korean_text: 너희가 옆구리와 어깨로 밀어뜨리고 모든 병든 자를 뿔로 받아 무리를 밖으로 흩어지게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: You fat sheep use your shoulders
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 뚱뚱한 양들은 너희 어깨를 사용하며

sentences.original_text: to push the other sheep away
